name: jetpack-boost
description: Boost your WordPress site's performance, from the creators of Jetpack

scripts.build-development: pnpm run clear-dist && pnpm run build-php && rollup -c
scripts.build-production: pnpm run clear-dist && pnpm run install-if-deps-outdated && pnpm run build-production-php && NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production rollup -c
scripts.build-production-php: rm -rf vendor/ && COMPOSER_MIRROR_PATH_REPOS=1 COMPOSER_ROOT_VERSION=dev-master composer install -o --no-dev --classmap-authoritative --prefer-dist
scripts.lint:js: npm run prettier && eslint . && echo '✔ prettier and eslint ran successfully.'
scripts.lint:js:fix: npm run prettier:fix && eslint . --fix && echo '✔ prettier and eslint --fix ran successfully.'
scripts.php:lint: composer lint && echo '✔ PHPCS ran successfully.'
scripts.php:fix: composer fix && echo '✔ PHPCBF ran successfully.'
scripts.test:phpunit-specific: docker run --rm --name my-running-script -v "$PWD":/usr/src/myapp -w /usr/src/myapp php:"${PHP_VERSION:-7.4}"-cli vendor/bin/phpunit --bootstrap tests/bootstrap.php --testsuite unit
scripts.test:integration:all: npm-run-all test:env-pull test:env-start && sleep 5 && npm-run-all test:deactivate-wordpress test:activate-wordpress test:activate-plugins test:jest test:env-stop
scripts.test:integration:run: npm-run-all test:env-pull test:env-start test:deactivate-wordpress test:activate-wordpress test:activate-plugins test:jest
scripts.test:wp-cli: docker run --env-file docker/boost-test/.env --rm --volumes-from boost-test_wordpress_1 --network container:boost-test_wordpress_1 -w /var/www/html --entrypoint /bin/bash wordpress:cli
scripts.test:activate-plugins: npm run test:wp-cli -- -c 'wp plugin activate jetpack-boost jetpack-boost-sidekick-test'
scripts.test:deactivate-plugins: npm run test:wp-cli -- -c 'wp plugin deactivate jetpack-boost jetpack-boost-sidekick-test'
scripts.dev:start: npm-run-all dev:env-start && sleep 5 && npm-run-all dev:activate-wordpress dev:activate-plugins
scripts.dev:wp-cli: docker run --env-file docker/boost-dev/.env --rm -u 33 --volumes-from boost-dev_wordpress_1 --network container:boost-dev_wordpress_1 -w /var/www/html --entrypoint /bin/bash wordpress:cli
scripts.dev:db-cli: docker run --rm -u 33 -it --volumes-from boost-dev_wordpress_1 --network container:boost-dev_wordpress_1 -w /var/www/html --entrypoint /bin/bash wordpress:cli -c 'wp db cli'
scripts.dev:activate-wordpress: npm run dev:wp-cli -- -c 'if ! wp core is-installed; then sleep 60 && wp core install --url=http://localhost:9001 --title=Jetpack-Boost-Dev --admin_user=admin --admin_password=jetpackboostpassword --admin_email=info@example.com --skip-email; fi'
scripts.dev:activate-plugins: npm run dev:wp-cli -- -c 'wp plugin activate jetpack-boost jetpack-boost-sidekick-dev-local'

author: Automattic
